title: Built-in desk, Penthouse available*, Elevators, Keyless entry
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Call Now - (617) 401-0759 x 2', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1326 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Rising 21 stories above the Boston Seaport, 100 Pier 4 is the must-have address near downtown.', '100 Pier 4 luxury apartment homes combine the kind of visually striking architecture and superbly livable interior design that can only be fully appreciated firsthand.', 'These Seaport apartments feature granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and California Closets.', "Revel in knockout views of Boston's downtown and harbor.", 'Make your life easier with a myriad of amenities including the high-end fitness center, gorgeous third-floor sun deck with outdoor pool, business center, resident lounge, and underground parking anticipate every need, every desire.', 'Come see these Boston apartments for yourself.', 'Features:', 'Central heat and air conditioning, Private balcony or terrace*, Full-size washer and dryer, California Closets available, Penthouse available*, Stainless steel kitchen appliances, Custom espresso-colored European-style cabinetry, Hardwood-style flooring, Granite countertops', '**Not all amenities available for every floor plan', '*Premium item', 'Community Amenities:', 'Floor-to-ceiling windows, Business center, Outdoor fireplace, Stand-alone shower, Electric car charging stations, 2 Conference rooms, Build credit score with RentTrack, Resident app, Closet
